sub_title: Supply Chain Planner at Fluke Corporation

profile_positions.description:
Tools: Oracle, Power BI, Five-Nine, oracle EBS web tools, visual compliance.
    • Responsible for processing orders in the Oracle system for all the services like creating RMA, quote to customer, warranty or not-warranty status, credit note, and all the necessary documents available to customs for returning the shipment.
    • Responsible for the export/import of the shipments.
    • Closely working with 200+ distributors all over the world.
    • Working with the technical team, tech support, finance, sales, UK/USA team.
    • Working closely with the Health care department, Industrial department, networking department & operational department.
    • Responsible for providing quotations to the customer and responsible for end-to-end process till the unit is serviced and return to customer.
    • Respond to customers within 24 hours and always available on phone /email support in working hours.
    • In direct contact with carriers TNT, UPS, and EXPEDITORS for the smooth flow of shipments.
    • Handle escalations.
    • Advise customer in detail about warranty status and provide complete detailed information of the service validity and the quotation.
    • Work with the Lab of Fluke and provide them the service request information to customers. 
    • Responsible to provide information to customers for parts orders till shipment completion.
    • Also work with the compliance team to verify all the customs documents which helps to pass the unit smoothly.
    • Worked as a floater sometimes in team if there is lack of staff.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Planner

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for End to end workflow for Israel and South Africa.
    • Manage ocean freight and Air (Door to Door).
    • Maintain sheets for information, track, record, and current status.
    • Coordinate inland trucking/rail to move goods end from the Netherlands.
    • Daily communications with customers, forwarders, custom broker on relevant issue and resolution. Handled complete inbound process.
    • Gathered, logged and monitor all shipping data.
    • Direct customer interaction and resolving queries for smooth flow.
    • Managed shipment schedules to maximize productivity and cut costs.
    • Execute order requests via phone, email, internet, and sales.
    • Track and trace shipments, confirm departure, arrivals, PODs as specified by Customer Standard Operating Procedures.
    • Worked on different tools like CDN, Advance Excel, GT nexus, GTS, FCS etc.
    • Handled escalations.
    • Communicated with dispatchers, warehouse, and customers regarding outgoing orders.
    • Coordinate product allocation
profile_positions.title: Customer Operations Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Serves as a basic point of contact for customers with complaints, queries, request, feedback.
    • Contribute in email, phone support & chat support to our customers.
    • Investigate troubleshoot & resolving customer issues.
    • Prepares daily reports on the daily activities of Customer Care team.
    • Ensures that all the request, queries and complaint of customer are responded in a timely and professional manner.
    • Recording of the complaints received from customers.
    • Provides all Back-office support tasks like sending and receiving mails.
    • Coordinates with Technician’s & Service Advisor’s in handling issues.
    • Provides customer support and handles the queries of clients
    • Researched and complied answers to provide information to customers.
    • Solved all major customer problems/queries that subordinates were not able to solve earlier.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Specialist / Administration
